org.corfudb.runtime.view

Class CorfuDBView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.runtime.view.CorfuDBView

  • public class CorfuDBView
extends Object
    This class provides a view of the CorfuDB infrastructure. Clients should not directly access the view without an interface.
    Author:
    Michael Wei

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CorfuDBView(javax.json.JsonObject jsonView) 
      CorfuDBView(Map<String,Object> config)
      Get a CorfuDBView from a configuration object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CorfuDBView

        public CorfuDBView(javax.json.JsonObject jsonView)

      • CorfuDBView

        public CorfuDBView(Map<String,Object> config)
        Get a CorfuDBView from a configuration object. This is used by the configuration master to construct the inital view of the system.
        Parameters:
        config - A configuration object from the parsed yml file.

    • Method Detail

      • setUUID

        public void setUUID(UUID uuid)

      • getUUID

        public UUID getUUID()

      • getEpoch

        public long getEpoch()

      • setEpoch

        public void setEpoch(long epoch)
        Attempts to move all servers in this view to the given epoch. This should be called by the configuration master only!

      • resetEpoch

        public void resetEpoch(long epoch)
        Manually force the view into the given epoch. This should be called by the configuration master only!
        Parameters:
        epoch - The epoch to move to

      • getSequencers

        public List<IServerProtocol> getSequencers()

      • getSegments

        public List<CorfuDBViewSegment> getSegments()

      • moveAllToNewEpoch

        public void moveAllToNewEpoch(long epoch)

      • getConfigMasters

        public List<IServerProtocol> getConfigMasters()

      • isViewAccessible

        public boolean isViewAccessible()
        Checks if all servers in the view can be accessed. Does not check to see if all the servers are in a valid configuration epoch.

      • getSerializedJSONView

        public javax.json.JsonObject getSerializedJSONView()

      • invalidate

        public void invalidate()
        Invalidate this view. This prevents this view from being used by clients accessing the view through CorfuDBRuntime.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Check if the view is valid.
        Returns:
        True if the view is valid, false otherwise.

      • getConfigurationMasterFromString

        public static IConfigMaster getConfigurationMasterFromString(String masterString)
